author: jdcasey
msg: [MREPOSITORY-3] Allow projects with packaging == pom, which allows creating a series of bundle artifacts for a multimodule build, one in each module's target directory. The pom project will include any attached/metadata files such as GPG signatures, in addition to the pom itself.
Additionally, batch mode will disable the file-selection prompt, causing Maven to accept all -* files found in the target directory/local repo directory.
